title: Looking for Ranked Team
body:
Hey I'm Looking for a team to play ranked with i have a few friends that would join but every position is still here.
 I main Jg but can play every other role.
A few requirements as follows:

Bronze/Silver
Strong Champion Pool
Laid Back Attitude
No Flaming
Willing to listen to calls/suggestions
Ability to use Discord
Time to play together more than once a week.

If this above fits you, fill this out then add at0miz in game, please have this filled out before adding:

IGN:
Rank:
Position:
Champions:
Strengths:
Weakness:
Timezone:
Availability:

Thanks for checking this out, good luck climbing.

replies.body:
IGN: Roronoa Aousy
Rank: Bronze V
Position: Mid(best) ,Bot (good),Top (good)
Champions:{{champion:45}} ,{{champion:10}} ,{{champion:21}}  (These are my best)

({{champion:89}} {{champion:28}}  ( I am training and trying to main these champs))

Strengths: I am always the one with the most KDA
Weakness: If team is too weak i will fall .
Timezone:  UTC/GMT +3 hours (AST)
Availability: Thursday , Friday , Saturday,(can be availibe on other days mostly.
(I am a student so sometimes i might busy doing my HW or studying for Exams but i get done fast)
You play on euw not oce sorry man cant add

**IGN:** Percival9 (will change soon)
**Rank:** Bronze IV
**Position:** Jg/Mid
**Champions:** {{champion:28}} , {{champion:1}} , {{champion:61}} , {{champion:55}} , {{champion:39}} , and  {{champion:121}} . I do own others, but these are my best.
**Strengths:** 80+% win-rate, so I must be doing _something _ right.
**Weakness:** I'm B4, so basically everything? If I had no weaknesses, I would be Challenger.
**Timezone:** GMT +1300 (NZT)
**Availability:** Monday, Tuesday, Thursday (evenings); Saturday (afternoon); Sunday (all day except between 5 and 7). Note: Uni student, so will have exams occasionally.

IGN: Toxic Russian
Rank: Diamond 5
Position: Top(Best) Jungle(Good) Mid(Good) ADC(Good) Support(I HATE SUPPORT)

Champions I play in the top lane: {{champion:6}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:74}}

Weaknesses: My Weaknesses is that I have none.
Timezone: AEST
